source.name: Boston by the Numbers: Taxes, Local Aid and Fiscal Conditions
source.description: Boston by the Numbers is a series created by the BRA Research Division that highlights the characteristics of Boston's population and economy. This report highlights Boston's fiscal conditions and tax generation.
